name: Booker T. Jones
description: '''Booker Taliaferro Jones Jr.''' (born November 12, 1944) is an American musician, songwriter, record producer and arranger, best known as the frontman of the band [[Booker T. & the M.G.'s]]. He has also worked in the studios with many well-known artists of the 20th and 21st centuries, earning him a [[Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award|Grammy Award for Lifetime Achievement.]] With the death of original Booker T. & the M.G.'s guitarist [[Steve Cropper]] on December 3, 2025, Jones is the last surviving original member of Booker T. & the M.G.â€™s.
